title: 296: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 4 & 5 (Is Everyone Breaking Up?? + ALL the Mixed Emotions!)
itunes:title: 296: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 4 & 5 (Is Everyone Breaking Up?? + ALL the Mixed Emotions!)
description:
The Broads are here to chat about episodes 4 and 5 of BIP - and they have SH*T to say - including some seriously unpopular opinions and hot takes! Let’s dive into this together because there is a lot to process and analyze like Deandra/Chasen/Karl, Mari/Kenny/Demi, Tammy/Aaron/Thomas, Jessenia/Chris/Ivan, Maurissa/Connor/Riley, Joe/Serena/Kendall, and more - WOW. Let’s get into it.
